PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04322018-04-20,  DND,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to (1) increase the initial time limit from one year to two years; (2) amend the authority level to grant a one-year extension for reasons relating to illness, injury, vocational rehabilitation, vocational training, education, or any other circumstance beyond the control of the eligible person; and (3) add a provision that allows the Chief of Defence Staff, or the Chief of Military Personnel, to personally grant a further extension.
AttachmentsAttachment
